channel.title: Problem clicking objects
channel.description: Everytime i click an object on my server it shows the object info eg. So if i click a door i get "ObjectId:XXXX ObjectX:XXXXObjectY:XXXX" in chat screen. I'm a complete noob on objects so can anyone help?

item.title: Problem clicking objects
item.dc:creator: @str2own99 str2own99
item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

well if u wanna remove it find if(c.playerRights >= 3) { Misc.println("objectId: "+c.objectId+" ObjectX: "+c.objectX+ " objectY: "+c.objectY+" Xoff: "+ (c.getX() - c.objectX)+" Yoff: "+ (c.getY() - c.objectY)); } else if (c.playerRights == 3) { c.sendMessage("objectId: " + c.objectId + " objectX: " + c.objectX + " objectY: " + c.objectY); }and comment it out

Read full topic

@str2own99 wrote:

if im right it shows if ur rights are set to 3 (mine does) so try making a new character and try it
